question: What are the Gandhian principles D.D. Upadhyaya borrowed from M.K. Gandhi?
explanation:
In 1965 , Integral Humanism was adopted as the official doctrine of the Jana Sangh in which Deen Dayal Upadhayaya has borrowed three Gandhian principles- 
1. Sarvodaya ( Progress of all)
2. Swadeshi (Indian Products)
3. Gram Swaraj (Village self sufficiency to self rule)
